text:
using 'webapps/example/security' sample
1) disable cookies in browser and run security example results in log error:
2001-08-10 11:53:04 - Ctx( /examples ): From login without a session
That's ok and makes sense.

2) disable cookies, add <%= response.encodeURL("j_security_check") %> to
 login.jsp and
 <a href='<%= response.encodeURL("protected/index.jsp") %>'> to index.jsp
 (former index.html)
 results:
 2001-08-10 11:56:44 - Ctx( /examples ): 404 R( /examples 
+ /jsp/security/login/null + null) null
  and a 'HTTP 404'

Tomcat 3.3 works fine this way (look at example) but we NEED this fixed in 
3.2.x as well since we run 3.2.x embedded in production with wireless devices 
where browsers don't support cookies. (Don't have resources to embedd 3.3 yet)

Tx and regards and please help,
Ulli Hoffmann
